author: Tyler Pager, Sean Sullivan, Seung Min Kim
title: Biden to nominate Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court
description: The president intends to name Jackson, a judge on the D.C. federal court of appeals, as his first Supreme nominee. She would be the first Black woman justice in the court's history.
content:
The people who disclosed the plan spoke on the condition of anonymity to talk more freely about a sensitive matter that had not been announced publicly.
Story continues below advertisement
